name: Onions Reduce Aggro
description:
Enjoy food prep games? Enjoy RPGs? How about preparing food for RPG heroes?

Create a menu with a range of delectable dishes that gives the heroes the stat boost they need! As you add more menu items, you will unlock new and exciting classes to patronage your diner. The occasional boss may even show up to dine at your establishment as they prepare for the nightly raids.

This is a playable demo. Proceeds will fund the purchase of additional assets. 

Please leave comments for all bugs and recommendations.
